threads.title: 820-00928 no picture
threads.message:

Nobody wants to tell me.
thank you for your time

threads.title: 820-00928 no picture
threads.message:
Welcome to the forum.
We are not magicians, we need informations about your board.

Any history available?
Check LCD connectors for any liquid sign.
Do you get external video?

threads.title: 820-00928 no picture
threads.message: There is NO PLZ bro here as PLZ bro will result in your post being ignored and forgotten...we need history what was the issue with this device liquid, drop damage, tech damage? As 2informaticos asked, external at least present?

threads.title: 820-00928 no picture
threads.message:
Thanks for the answer
I'm not a magician either

no liquid

no picture

I have a second monitor connected, the same no backlight and no picture

Best regards

threads.title: 820-00928 no picture
threads.message: If you don't even get external video, this probably has a bad CPU/GPU. Pull the board and inspect closely for any signs of corrosion on both sides of the board.

threads.title: 820-00928 no picture
threads.message:
"I have a second monitor connected, the same no backlight and no picture"
Do you mean external monitor, or just tested another screen assembly?
Try disconnected internal LCD, with external monitor connected.
